arm_group.description: Patients with uncontrolled glaucoma undergoing Ahmed glaucoma valve implantation for intraocular pressure reduction.

brief_summary.textblock:
Long term results after Ahmed glaucoma valve implantation for uncontrolled glaucoma are
      retrospectively examined.

clinical_study.brief_title: Long Term Outcome After Ahmed Glaucoma Valve

detailed_description.textblock:
The development of intraocular pressure, visual acuity, number of glaucoma medication,
      number of complications and necessity of revision operations after Ahmed glaucoma valve
      implantation for uncontrolled glaucoma is examined yearly for a period of 4 years.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients suffering from medically uncontrolled glaucoma

          -  Informed consent

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  healthy subjects

          -  under 18 years

study_pop.textblock: Patients suffering from uncontrolled glaucoma, most often after multiple ocular surgery.

intervention.description: The flexible plate 7 (FP7) model (New World Medical) was implanted in patients with uncontrolled glaucoma.

clinical_study.official_title: 4-year Follow-up After Ahmed Glaucoma Valve Implantation for Lowering Intraocular Pressure in Different Types of Glaucoma

other_outcome.description: The number of glaucoma medication after Ahmed glaucoma valve implantation are being examined over a period of 4 years.
Possible postoperative complications after Ahmed glaucoma valve implantation are being examined over a period of 4 years.
The need for revision operations after Ahmed glaucoma valve implantation is being examined over a period of 4 years.

oversight_info.authority: Germany: Federal Institute for Drugs and Medical Devices

primary_outcome.description: The reduction of intraocular pressure after Ahmed glaucoma valve implantation is observed over a period of 4 years.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: The development of visual acuity after Ahmed glaucoma valve implantation is being examined over a period of 4 years.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case Control, Time Perspective: Retrospective
